@Sebastien Gouezel https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/2513/files#diff-1a6728929191ce104cb0e1b8bc1a9cdeR249
Have you considered defining this by pattern matching on n? I have no idea whether it would make a big difference...
If the particular case were 0, I would definitely pattern-match. Here it is 1, so it feels less natural to me.
I see... I think for n = 1 I would still do it... but I don't know if it matters much.
@Sebastien Gouezel I think I'm done reviewing: #2614
I've added a congr lemma, which allowed me to get rid of lots of heqs and also golf proofs
There is also a blocks_fun_congr at the top of the file. But maybe it's not worth keeping that one.
Some proofs are of course very long, and some are a bit slowish. But all in all, I think this is almost ready for merging.
Thanks a lot for the review, it is amazing. I have updated the PR accordingly.
